description: Describes the Amazon OpenSearch Service instances that you have reserved in a given Region. For more information, see Reserved Instances in Amazon OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstances
nested_items.description: List of Reserved Instances in the current Region.

nested_items.name: ReservationName
nested_items.description: The customer-specified identifier to track this reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

nested_items.name: BillingSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the billing subscription.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceOfferingId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The OpenSearch instance type offered by theReserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the reservation was purchased.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration, in seconds, for which the OpenSearch instance is reserved.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The upfront fixed charge you will paid to purchase the specific Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate at which you're charged for the domain using this Reserved Instance.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of OpenSearch instances that have been reserved.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Reserved Instance.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option as defined in the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring charge to your account, regardless of whether you create any domains using the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The monetary amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.
